reviewText: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS . EROS HAS CUT IMPORTANT PORTION OF THE MOVIE.

Bummer. This is another classic Hindi film that for some reason Eros has not subtitled the songs, only the dialog. Just like Mother India. Hindi songs are the freaking movie after all! 80% of the plot is always achieved in the melody. Big fail.
Amazing mystery movie.  Always has you wondering what's next.  Enjoyable movie/songs.
I had no problems at all with this dvd and enjoyed watching every minute of it, the songs are absolute classics!!
The 1 star is for the extremely poor video quality. The movie is an eternal 5 stars and a must-own for Shammi fans. Mr. Nazir Hussain's successors should re-issue a top quality Blu-Ray.
